website_summaries.verdict: This towel warmer's chrome finish looks great, but it doesn't heat as well as expected for the price.
pros: Unlike most competitors, this warmer is gentle enough to heat swimsuits, bedding, and hand washable items
cons: Has a tendency to heat towels unevenly

customer_reviews.title: owned this for 10 years
customer_reviews.text: i bought this exact model from amazon in 2010. i never turned it off. towels were always warm. great product. i'm buying another one today.
customer_reviews.author: C. Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: disappointed in this product - does not warm towels at all
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping this would have been a good solution for my cold towels...but it's not. First it only has off and on button no way of making it hotter. Second I leave it on 24/7 and whatever I put on it, being towels or a night gown, never gets really hot or at best warm, just tepid. I wish I could return it as I am really not happy with it. A very unhappy customer here. C
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Add Glam for low price to your bath room[s]
customer_reviews.text: Loved the first one so much [master bath], i 'had' to buy another one for the guest bath. Such a simple assembly..even though the hex tool was NOT included with either order. Looks nice just as a towel rack. PG&E would love it i left it plugged in 24 hrs as recommended, but i will not do that. The 'footer' is wide enough in front that i set a rectangular metal basket in that area for magazines. Looks great. Only complaint...made in China....thus the low price though.
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: just like it says it will
customer_reviews.text: It warms and dries out towels, just like it says it will. It won't warm your bathroom, and it won't heat as evenly as your clothes dryer. It may not work as well as one of the $200 towel dryer.... but then.... you paid less than a quarter of that, if you got this one... so don't complain about it doing wat is says it will, but nothing more. We've been using it for about a month now. It works..... I will be able to comment on power consumption next month
customer_reviews.author: Agricola

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS-DEFECTIVE
customer_reviews.text: The side bars have little round plastic coverings. After a couple of weeks of use, one of the coverings melted and fell out, leaving exposed wiring. EXPOSED WIRING IN A BATHROOM APPLIANCE! Thought it was a defect with specific unit so had Amazon send a replacement. Same issue happened with replacement unit in the exact same spot (second covering from the top on the right hand side if you are facing the towel rack). Leads me to think there is a design defect with some of these.
customer_reviews.author: BDT

customer_reviews.title: Has worked great for me.
customer_reviews.text: Have owned this towel warmer for over three years now. I have the warmer plugged into a timer in the wall socket so it turns on at 5:30 in the morning and warms the towels before my shower. I put my damp towel opened fully up and draped over the warmer, and the warmer stays on until 10:00 a.m., at which time my towel is fully dry. Have had zero problems with towel mildew since getting this product. Huge fan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good value.
customer_reviews.text: This rack does not heat enough to matter even after 45 min. The base loosens up after about a week and requires frequent retightening.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Cryan, PhD

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: Did not hold up, overheated and plastic pegs in the side fell out warped... Cumbersome... Going to junk it..
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne C

customer_reviews.title: Not warm
customer_reviews.text: Believe something wrong with this one. It did not warm towels enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jill N Starwalt

customer_reviews.title: My husband and I like it very much
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I like it very much! We were not sure if it's the best deal for the price but it is a of right now...
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Winborn

customer_reviews.title: needs a lot of real estate in bathroom
customer_reviews.text: And really only dries the top of the towel. In fact, the top gets almost rough because it is so dry. It also gets warm, but again only the top third (which is the middle when you take the towel off). All in all, we will take it up to the lake,where drying towels in more of a problem. We did experiment with multiple ways f hanging towels and arranging them,and never really were satisfied with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Luxury in the the bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a towel warmer since we moved to a cooler climate. This is one of the best things I ever bought. It is such a delight to wrap up in a warm dry towel on a cool day. I also put my pajamas on there, between towels and that is a soothing feeling as well. Put the folded towels in layers. The ones on the bottom are the warmest. the towels are now always dry and warm. One minor flaw is that the heat is not evenly distributed. The towel ends are not as warm, but it is still a great luxurious feeling after a shower or bath.
customer_reviews.author: J. Glasser

customer_reviews.title: Super love it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy that i bought this towel warm rail.It is so worth it..It's not just warm but it gets really hot which is super nice for the towel.I don't know why other reviews said it's not getting hot.It's not true.It dries my towel really well and fast..It looks good in my small bathroom as well.Would definitely recommend this towel warm rail. It's worth the price..I super love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Towel DRYER Not Warmer.
customer_reviews.text: It does the job, dries all my towels overnight or even after 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Bitzinger

customer_reviews.title: Not a Keeper
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this item. There were sharp edges on the rack, that snagged a towel immediately upon placing it on the rack. The rack is also very light and seemed flimsy to me.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Complete Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: This is a complete waste of money. The only warm spots are where the towel actually touches the bar...and even then just barely. It was a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I love this! It not only holds all our towels
customer_reviews.text: We recently remodeled our master bath and we needed something to hold our damp towels ... the wall mounted towel rack wasn't doing the job. I love this! It not only holds all our towels, but warms them up nicely for us. And it actually makes our master bath look elegant.
customer_reviews.author: arkielibrarian

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: returned it. Very cheap quality and has no on/off switch or timer.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret J.

customer_reviews.title: Affordable luxury
customer_reviews.text: This is such an affordable luxury. Our old towel warmer died after many years so I bought this one. It is heavy, sturdy as to not tip over and large so that it holds a lot of towels. Also, it warmed up very quickly and dried your towels off after your bath or shower.
customer_reviews.author: Gina729

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: It's a little on the flimsy side, but all it has to do is hold a couple of towels. It works great and I live in Hawaii where you really need one if you want your towel to dry....ever!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Romer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: Easily assembled, keeps the towels warm and dry. Very reasonably priced. I added a simple wall socket mounted timer and now it is on when needed and off when not.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Melgares

customer_reviews.title: Broken in-transit
customer_reviews.text: The product works as advertised. However, one of the plastic 'feet' on the bottom which help stabilize the rack was broken when I opened the packaging. Other people have reviewed this product and mentioned the issue with lack of padding for the box. Mr. Manufacturer, I cannot recommend your product to my friends and family due to the apparently persistent negligence when it comes to customer satisfaction. I hope you read these reviews and fix the issue.
customer_reviews.author: jdawsari

customer_reviews.title: It would be better if it could be closer to the shower in ...
customer_reviews.text: As a towel warmer, this does an adequate job. It would be better if it could be closer to the shower in order to use immediately after removing the towel from the rack, as they cool down quickly, but my plug is a little further away. The best aspect, though, is that my towels are now always completely DRY, regardless of the humidity. No more musty smell or damp towels!
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2, 50% working
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of them. One works fine, the other is not working and we are returning for a refund! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Make sure all is milled correctly and that tool is enclosed as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The first product did not have a screw that fit the hole that was drilled. The hole was incorrectly drilled. I ordered a second one, and it was fine. I am returning the original order.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's just alright
customer_reviews.text: So, I'm sure there is a maximum heat setting to prevent burns, but unless the entire this is covered in towels and let on 24/7...it doesn't get very warm. We purchased this to go outside by the hot tub on cold nights. It couldn't keep up unless it stayed completely covered and only the part of the towel actually touching metal was even luke warm. Wouldn't buy it again for the hot tub purpose, but maybe ok in masterbath. I just don't want to leave the sucking electricity all day like it says in the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Sparkle n Spice

customer_reviews.title: Has a problem.
customer_reviews.text: Great item as expected. However one of the holes was too large for the screw and would not stay up without support. Called maker and a new item was supposed to be shipped a week ago. However, I have not received the replacement as yet.
customer_reviews.author: jim m

customer_reviews.title: Does not warm the entire towel
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife for Christmas. She is not real happy with it and quit using it. It doesn't heat the entire towel, only warms where the bars touch the towel and the outside of the towel stays cold. Our bathroom is in the back of the house and not that warm, that's why I got it for her. I guess it needs a warm bathroom. Wish I could send it back.
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: Great Solid Unit
customer_reviews.text: This unit is well built and solid. It keeps your towels dry and warm as advertised. It consumes about 100 watts so it can cost about 28 cents a day to operate at 11.5 cents per kilowatt hour. It does have a on/off switch but takes about 30 minutes to warm up.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Broken and second hand when it arrived.
customer_reviews.text: This arrived with missing pieces. The box also showed it was second hand
customer_reviews.author: J. Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This just Barely warms our towels. We're disappointed with this rack. 80w just isn't enough juice to feel a difference.
customer_reviews.author: ABQ Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Better watch your electric bill
customer_reviews.text: takes forever to heat a normal towel. Better watch your electric bill!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not good enough
customer_reviews.text: Good towel warmer for two towels, so long as you keep them folded and intertwined in the bars. Any exposed bars did not heat well. I liked that I could keep in plugged in all the time and not worry about it overheating, but that was only because it did not get hot. The cross bars got warm, but did not heat the towels much more than room temperature. For the price, I expected it to actually get the towels MUCH warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Dry towels but not warm
customer_reviews.text: I like it and use it. It easily dries 2 bath towels and is simple to assemble but don't expect a warm towel: comes out warmish. This is my second unit and I prefer this one because it has more bars.
customer_reviews.author: dp

customer_reviews.title: Hearts very well
customer_reviews.text: The only minor problem I have with it (compared to the one it replaced) is that it is not terrible easy to pull the towel off the top of the warmer because of the raised end. The fact that the electrical controls are internal (unlike our former one) is a real plus because the former ones were constantly being damaged from feet, mops. etc.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Ridge

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely not what I expected. The only part that warms the towel is right where it sits on the bar. very disappointed !!! and I'm very disappointed at the fact that the other reviews I read seem to have been fairly favorable for this product.don't buy it you will be very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Warmrails
customer_reviews.text: It's very nice looking and good quality. It's been too warm for me to want to use the heating element.
customer_reviews.author: The Bliss

customer_reviews.title: hardly warm at all
customer_reviews.text: I can touch the bars and not worry about getting burned, that is how very lukewarm it is. Finally going to get rid of it and get something that keeps the towels nice and warm, as it is supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not happy.
customer_reviews.text: Its been a two weeks and I am noticing parts falling off. Its definitely sturdier with a wider base. Each rod has two plastic buttons which covers two ends of the rod and I am noticing the plastic buttons are changing shape due to heat and either falling off to the ground or falling in side the vertical frames. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sudip K Das

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE !!
customer_reviews.text: It does not warm anything and parts fell off within one week of use and even though I filed a complaint nothing was done and now I have a piece of junk that doesn't work as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came dented in four places and now the side plugs are starting to fall out missing one already.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick Delivery!  LOVE THE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom, she is always cold when she gets out of the tub. She loves it. It came in two days as promised. Even though I wasn't really expecting it to be here before Christmas. I know there has been things on the news, but I LOVE AMAZON and will continue to buy from them. You can't change mother nature....
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Y. Santiago

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty good. I wish it were larger for 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty good. I wish it were larger for 2 bath towels side by side, as I understood it. Overall it works well
customer_reviews.author: David H

customer_reviews.title: ... now and still warming towels for morning showers - love it!
customer_reviews.text: 7 years old now and still warming towels for morning showers - love it!
customer_reviews.author: Brian M Mack

customer_reviews.title: Really nice. It was a replacement and I really like ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice. It was a replacement and I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kwan

customer_reviews.title: Not that great....
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I'm disappointed with this product. The towels never get very warm. I left a towel on the rack for 30 minutes and the best it could do was get it to a little above room temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Disapointed

customer_reviews.title: didn't really warm the towels
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this product. I've always wanted a towel-warmer and it is really cold where I live. However, it really only creates stripes of warmth on the towels. It wasn't worth the price for me.
customer_reviews.author: yichafa

customer_reviews.title: warmer
customer_reviews.text: Warms pretty good. Good job of drying towels! Wattage is not provided in literature . Therefore, unable to predict operating cost.(Will know soon enough when next utility bill is received.) Currently have installed on a timer to reduce hours on by half.
customer_reviews.author: KYGuy

customer_reviews.title: A must for cold weather when you have no heating in the house
customer_reviews.text: This product works great and really keep the towels dry and warm as advertised. You just have to be very meticulous with your towels and place them correctly in the rails (as shown in the color picture above) after you use them, every time, routinely.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Ascanio

customer_reviews.title: This is my second Hyde Parks towel warmer.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my second home. Works great and came packaged as new but found end caps on top of unit looked used and there was a chip in the chrome on the left side. Was this a refurbished unit sold as new? Unit works fine so will keep it but not happy if I paid full price for refurbished unit.
customer_reviews.author: David Toy

customer_reviews.title: Towels are warm and dry, looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, added a timer in line based on other reviews for the energy consumption. I have it turn on a couple hours before I get up to shower. When I get out the towel is nice and warm, but most importantly dry.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Great heated towel rack!
customer_reviews.text: This heated towel rack is great! Stays nice and hot and my towels are toasty warm on those cold morning after my shower.
customer_reviews.author: werlcsw

customer_reviews.title: Insufficient heat for drying towels.
customer_reviews.text: Does not get warm enough. The only part of the towel that ended up dry was the portion that was in contact with the rack. I had to return it because the towels were still damp and mildewed.
customer_reviews.author: sf-dad

customer_reviews.title: It isn't worth it!
customer_reviews.text: After warming up my towel for over 20 minutes only the sections of towel that were touching the bars got warmed. It isn't worth it! Don't do it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but tricky to get the towel to absorb the heat.
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice in the bathroom and handles two towels for my wife and I very well. The instructions say to add an additional towel on top to get your towel to be warmer. The bars are plenty warm and that extra towel as insulation does work to get the towel a little warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Family_K

customer_reviews.title: Warm towels are great
customer_reviews.text: A little larger than expected but it works great. I use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This towel warmer does not work as the manufacturer describes. The towels only get warm on the bar that they are hanging on. The rest of the towel remains at room temperature. As for drying, it took approximately two days to dry a medium weight sweater.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Carter

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Only a 4 star rating. It is smaller than appears and tends to heat more where the rails are instesd of evenly. Still for the price hard to find one better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Towel Heater
customer_reviews.text: We live in New England and have a year round spa in a glass patio room. We only heat the room to about 50 degrees in winter and thought a heated towel rack would be very nice after a dip in the hot tub. This rack is working just as we had hoped. We put the towels on the rack a couple of hours before they will be used and they are nice and warm when we need them!
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: JUST WHATIi WAS LOOKING  FOR !
customer_reviews.text: very nice - solid and heavy - looks great -no dissapointment -good value - best that I found in this category
customer_reviews.author: HAL HALLIBURTON

customer_reviews.title: improve your mom-in-law rating
customer_reviews.text: my daughter-in-law will love me forever. this was the best Christmas present i could have gotten for her. i got huge brownie points!!!!!!!!!! try one of these for yourself or for that special someone you need to upgrade your own rating from. this is larger than most other warmers. it is quality merchandise and can be moved if needed. it is also very attractive with or without towels on it.
customer_reviews.author: choosyfloosy

customer_reviews.title: Warm not toasty.
customer_reviews.text: The warmrails towel warmer is a bit of a disappointment. It takes too long to warm the towel and only does a fair job of that. Perhaps a different type of towel will improve the results.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES P.

customer_reviews.title: Returned product, not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I can compare this to a very luke warm coffee, useless. It does not warm a towel. Returned. Bottom base awkward.
customer_reviews.author: JCB

customer_reviews.title: No warmth
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this. Towels did not get as warm as the other reviews stated. They got warmer hanging them inf front of the heat register in the bathroom. Was looking very forward to this product doing what it said it would.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Nice Towel Warmer
customer_reviews.text: Mr son and wife really loved this towel stand. It was a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: Repeat buyer
customer_reviews.text: Bought my first Hyde Park about 10 years ago, it is still working perfectly and purchased this one as a gift. They love it too - it is just a feeling of luxury to have a warm towel, and it works great to dry out those swim suits.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Boldin

customer_reviews.title: This product is just "ok"
customer_reviews.text: Does a really decent job, but doesn't warm the towels as much as I'd like. I've used others before, and was a little disappointed it doesn't warm them better.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Picken Jr

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't warm towels well
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't warm the towels very well. I followed the directions, folded towels in thirds, let heat for the whole day, and it just doesn't produce enough heat to make the towels warm, very disappointing.......
customer_reviews.author: Debby Harlan

customer_reviews.title: Definite buy!
customer_reviews.text: They are great for warming your towel while you shower. It gives it a cozy feeling. It can also be used to warm up those cold mittens and coat when you come in from the cold!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Returned product
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Returned product. Followed manufacturer's instructions to hang several folded towels on racks, however, after 24 hours towels were barely warmed.
customer_reviews.author: S&W Family

customer_reviews.title: Need it hotter
customer_reviews.text: They are just okay. They could get the heat up a little.
customer_reviews.author: John R Mpls

customer_reviews.title: Parts missing
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to get it, however parts missing. Amazon put me to the seller and money was refunded. Very easy will continue to shop with Amazon. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for about 6 months and haven't had any problems. It's easy to assemble, too. I put it on a timer as suggested by other reviewers.
customer_reviews.author: Houstonian

customer_reviews.title: nice and warm
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as I had expected the towel warmer to be, nice and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Ebrew

customer_reviews.title: Good except...
customer_reviews.text: The only problem with the towel warmer is that it takes 25 minutes to warm up. It needs a built-in timer to turn it on and off.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: how did i live without it?
customer_reviews.text: I lived in London for 5 weeks this summer, and in both my hotel and my flat they had a towel warming rack built into the wall. Once you live with this thing for a few weeks you don't want to live without it. Back in NJ, I've been enjoying this Warmrails floor stand. I'm looking forward to the winter to see how the towels feel on a cold day. So far, so good. I'll be taking it with me when we move.
customer_reviews.author: bboydvaughn

customer_reviews.title: Warm towels, wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this model because of price, think I would prefer a wall mount next time, might convert this one at some point. Great way to make sure you have a dry towel in the morning. Also might add that the towel warmer does add a bit of heat to the bathroom which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Did not function as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I finally ordered this towel warmer after months of wanting one. It arrived, and set-up was easy and minimal. I plugged it in the outlet, and all excitement disappeared after I realized this wasn't going to warm up anything, much less a towel. There's a warning label on the horizontal bars noting not to touch them once they are plugged in as they may burn you. Well, mine might have been dysfunctional, but it never got hot, and I was able to grip the bars and they were barely warm – some warmer than others, but none were ever hot. Returned it the next day. My dryer does a better job of warming towels in two minutes.
customer_reviews.author: sb

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bottom stand is way to big . Takes up to much floor space.
customer_reviews.author: brenda

customer_reviews.title: Not Great
customer_reviews.text: We were very disappointed with the quality of this product. I wanted something that would warm and dry towels before/after showers. This seemed to neither. Quality was also very poor.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: The Warnrails freestanding towel warmer does a great job drying two sets of towels and keeping them warm. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Gary VanDoren

customer_reviews.title: Not so Great!
customer_reviews.text: I expected a super warm towel. It barely warms it. Just on the spot where its hung. Maybe I need to weave the towel through all the bars. But I dont know. I would try another one. This one kinda sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Daly

customer_reviews.title: Warmrails hyde Park towel watmer
customer_reviews.text: We had a problem with the humidity in our apartment and our towels were not drying properly. This rack warms them and they are dry within a short time. This is really worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: jkonschak

customer_reviews.title: just thought it would ne nice to get a new one
customer_reviews.text: pluged it in and after some time it got hot....really really hot !!! couldn't touch the sides...and the towels didn.t get warm...this unit was to replace the "working" unit that i had...just thought it would ne nice to get a new one !!!! sent it back and am now looking for a different one...can't live without one now !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: SUZANNE LAURENCE

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: It was what I expected I wish it was a bit warmer,Oh yeah also one of the bars was a bit darker than the others ,but it's okay
customer_reviews.author: Marian Patton

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Takes more than 3 hours to warm bath towels adequately
customer_reviews.author: stephen dodson

customer_reviews.title: Came in the wrong finish but box was correct and It doesn't warm the towels very well
customer_reviews.text: Came in the wrong finish but box was correct but the big disappointment was that It doesn't warm the towels very well!
customer_reviews.author: bill gouckenour

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This did not warm up the towel. It did get extremely hot though.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Pick something else.
customer_reviews.text: Never buy this product, ever. The rails were very hot but it never transferred to anything I put on it. The way it is constructed the towel doesn't lie against the rails enough to warm it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Jones

customer_reviews.title: Towel Warmer Not Too Good
customer_reviews.text: The warmer only warmed the towel where it touched the towel no matter how we wrapped it around the bars.
customer_reviews.author: Arnold Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Barley gets hot...
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't really compare to the built-in towel warmers you find in Europe. It literally barely gets hot. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Harley L.

customer_reviews.title: Warmrails
customer_reviews.text: It takes about 2 hours to warm up 2 bath sheets. I have not tried it on smaller items. I just use it for warming up the towels on cool evenings after hot tubing.
customer_reviews.author: sirreal

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love having a warm towel when I get out of the shower! I should have bought one of these earlier!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Maybe mine is defective?
customer_reviews.text: asking for a refund. A shame as it looks great, just does not get the towels warm at all. Sort of defeats the purpose eh?
customer_reviews.author: walter hammock

customer_reviews.title: Great towel dryer at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together in 3 minutes. Great job of drying and keeping towels warm. After towels are dry in 2-3 hours, we always turn it off. Only minor downside, the electric cord was on the right and our outlet was on the left. But cord was long enough to reach the outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D.

customer_reviews.title: The Warmrails does not warm equally and anyway mostly not ...
customer_reviews.text: The Warmrails does not warm equally and anyway mostly not warm enough. On the same time the buttons on the connection points of the rails are made of plastic and they melt ! see clearly on attached photo
customer_reviews.author: Ram Ben David

customer_reviews.title: This product was quite the disappointment. Bought it as a gift
customer_reviews.text: This product was quite the disappointment. Bought it as a gift. It really doesn't warm the towels that much and I wound up throwing it away. There might be others on the market much better, I hope. But, this one is not good.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I greatly enjoyed the warm towels in the bathroom at a hotel in London. I hoped to recreate that feeling daily with my own towel warmer - this was a real disapointment - toasty is an overstatement - the heat imparted to the towels overnight dissipated in less than a minute - pretty mediocre. I returned it to Amazon for refund
customer_reviews.author: Luigi Facotti

customer_reviews.title: very warm and nice.
customer_reviews.text: inexpensive and does the job well, no problems after 3 years service
customer_reviews.author: the swede

customer_reviews.title: Did not work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Towels were just warm in spots, not what I expected, I have returned the product for a refund,Amazon makes the return process very easy!
customer_reviews.author: Dean Peterson

product_meta.title: Warmrails FBA WHC Hyde Park Towel Warmer, 39-Inch, Chrome Finish
product_meta.description:
Color:Chrome FinishThe Warmrails WHC Hyde Park Family Sized Towel Warmer is a must-have bathroom accessory. No more having to worry about mildew or unpleasant odors from wet towels. The Warmrails WHC Hyde Park Warmer dries your towels faster than air drying, keeping everything fresh and warm. Imagine the luxurious feeling of stepping out of your bath or shower into a fresh, clean, heated towel. The on/off switch is illuminated for easy access in the dark and it comes with a 7’ power cord and grounded plug. The chrome finished rails are designed to warm up in about 15-20 minutes, making sure that your towels can get dry and stay warm. After a day at the pool or the beach, the last thing you want is soggy towels drying for days, the Warmrails Towel Warmer makes sure that you will always have a great spot to dry your towels and swimwear. Minimal assembly required. Dimensions are 24.25” W x 13.75” D x 39” H. Warmrails is the nation's leading national brand of affordable towel warmers, offering a variety of towel warmers in five different styles. This product is designed to meet consumers' needs in luxury and performance, all at an affordable price.

AMAZON.COM
This free-standing Hyde Park drying rack and towel warmer from Warmrails adds luxury to your daily routines and cuts down on daily chores. Designed to get towels deliciously toasty, the rack also helps keep them dry and fresh, reducing the need for laundering and the overall presence of mildew. Its dry electric Filatherm element runs without the use of oil or liquid and uses less energy than a typical light bulb. Styled like a ladder with a subtle curve to the rungs, the rack features a handsome chrome finish. Warmrails recommends running it 24 hours a day but includes a discreet on/off switch for when it is not needed. Both UL- and CUL-listed, the rack plugs in with a standard three-prong power cord and can easily be transported from the bathroom to the laundry room or nursery. Measuring 24-1/8 by 13-3/4 by 39 inches, it requires minimal assembly and carries a one-year warranty. --Emily Bedard
feature_bullets: Dry and warm delicates, swimsuits, baby blankets and bedding
